movie.title: Blended
movie.actors: Adam Sandler, Drew Barrymore, Kevin Nealon, Terry Crews
movie.plot: After a blind date gone horribly wrong, Jim and Lauren agree they never, ever want to see each other again. Well, that's all about to change when the two find themselves and their respective families (including children) all stuck together in one suite at an African Safari vacation spot.
movie.tomatoConsensus: Lurching between slapstick and schmaltz without showing much of a commitment to either, Blended commits the rare Sandler sin of provoking little more than boredom.
